name: My Best Fiend
description:
I made it based on the concept of "I want you to rest without doing anything".

Please spend time doing nothing while watching the natural scenery and the animals playing.

Then I made this work for my friend, but decided to open it to the public.

Recommended usage environment

CPU : Ryzen5600X or higher

Memory : 8GB or higher

GPU : GTX1650 or higher

OS : Windows 10
